<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Instinctive Obfuscation](/Feats.aspx?ID=4436) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Gnome" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=80" />
<trait label="Illusion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=92" />
<trait label="Visual" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=163" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 53 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Frequency**
once per hour

**Prerequisites**
at least one arcane or occult innate spell gained from a gnome heritage or gnome ancestry feat

**Trigger**
You are attacked by a foe, but they haven’t rolled yet

</column>

---

The magic within you manifests as a natural reaction to threats. An illusory double of you appears in your space for a brief moment. The triggering attacker must roll a DC 10 flat check; on a success, the attack targets you normally; if they fail, the attack targets the double and destroys it. The tradition of this action matches the tradition of your gnome ancestry options.
name: Instinctive Obfuscation
prerequisite: at least one arcane or occult innate spell gained from a gnome heritage or gnome ancestry feat
